meanings.definition: A basic amino acid that is essential for the body to function properly.
meanings.sent1: Arginine is important for our health.
meanings.sent2: The body needs arginine to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: Without arginine, our bodies would be in trouble!
meanings.sent4: Arginine is like the building blocks for our bodies.
meanings.sent5: Remember to include arginine in your diet for a healthy body.
